name: Wings of Absolute Zero
text:
At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "Aurora Wing" and 1 "Blizzard Falcon" to your Deck. Then, add 1 "Ice Beast Zerofyne" to your Extra Deck.
In addition, the following effect can be used once per Duel. All WATER monsters you control become Winged Beast-Type monsters until the end of the turn.
